text: Ebrard or Ébrard is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Guy Ébrard (1926–2017), French politician *Johannes Heinrich August Ebrard (1818–1888), German theologian * Marie Ébrard, author of La bonne cuisine de Madame E. Saint-Ange under the pseudonym E. Saint-Ange *Marcelo Ebrard (born 1959), Mexican politician
title: Ebrard
